regions.name: Eldoria
regions.description: A small town of about 250 people, with the usual buildings: an inn, a market, various shops, a small temple, and the lord's residence. It serves as a friendly base for adventurers.
regions.DM_notes: Town population is mostly humans and a few halflings. The lord is well-liked but worried about bandit and monster threats. The town is the main hub for clues and resources.

locations.name: Main Road Entrance
locations.description: The main road leading into Eldoria, bustling with travelers and locals. From here you can enter the town or head into the surrounding forest.
locations.DM_notes: Starting location for players. The road is well maintained but somewhat wary travelers keep an eye on the forest edge.

paths.description: A dirt road leading into the heart of Eldoria, lined with small shops and homes.
paths.DM_notes: Relatively safe path, occasional town guard patrols.

paths.description: A narrow path leading out of town into the dense and dark forest.
paths.DM_notes: Less safe, potential for encounters with bandits or wildlife.

locations.name: Town Square
locations.description: The central square of Eldoria, with a well and a notice board. Locals gather here for news and trade.
locations.DM_notes: Place to find rumors and quests. Occasional festivals.

paths.description: The main road leading out of town towards the forest and beyond.
A busy market area with stalls selling food, potions, and adventuring gear.
paths.DM_notes: Good place to buy supplies and gather information.

paths.description: The town inn, popular with travelers and adventurers looking for rest or company.
paths.DM_notes: Potential place to meet NPCs and get lodging.

paths.description: A small temple dedicated to a local deity.
paths.DM_notes: Place for healing and spiritual guidance.

paths.description: A well-maintained house occupied by the lord of the region.
paths.DM_notes: The lord can provide quests or support.

locations.name: Inn
locations.description: A cozy inn with a common room and several guest rooms upstairs.
locations.DM_notes: Good place to rest and gather rumors. The innkeeper is friendly and knowledgeable.

paths.description: Back to the town square.

locations.name: Market
locations.description: An open-air market with many stalls selling food, weapons, armor, and adventuring gear.
locations.DM_notes: Merchants are friendly but watch for pickpockets.

paths.description: Return to the town square.

locations.name: Temple
locations.description: A quiet temple dedicated to a local deity offering minor healing and blessings.
locations.DM_notes: Priest can provide healing and minor blessings.

paths.description: Back to the town square.

locations.name: Lord's Residence
locations.description: A comfortable manor occupied by the lord of the region, who oversees local affairs.
locations.DM_notes: Lord can give quests and background information about the forest dangers.

paths.description: Back to the town square.

regions.name: Deepwood Forest
regions.description: A tangled, dense forest surrounding Eldoria, difficult to navigate the deeper in you go. It contains ruins, caves, and several hostile camps.
regions.DM_notes: Forest is home to bandits, goblins, and other monsters. The terrain is tricky and can disorient the unwary. Clues to ruins are available in town.

locations.name: Forest Edge
locations.description: The edge of the Deepwood Forest just outside Eldoria, where the trees grow thick but the path is still visible.
locations.DM_notes: Relatively safe but keep alert for bandits or wild animals.

paths.description: Path back to Eldoria's main road.
A narrow, hidden trail leading deeper into the forest towards a bandit camp.
A rough path leading into the forest where goblin camps have been spotted.
A faint trail that heads deeper into the forest towards ancient ruins.
paths.DM_notes: Requires clues from town to find safely.

locations.name: Bandit Camp
locations.description: A hidden bandit camp in the forest, with makeshift tents and a guarded perimeter.
locations.DM_notes: Bandits are hostile and may ambush adventurers. Loot includes stolen goods from Eldoria.

paths.description: Path back to the forest edge and Eldoria.
paths.DM_notes: Bandits may try to intercept travelers.

locations.name: Monster Camp
locations.description: A goblin camp deep in the forest, noisy and dangerous.
locations.DM_notes: Goblin warriors and hunters reside here. Frequent patrols near the camp.

paths.description: Trail leading back towards Eldoria.

locations.name: Forest Ruins
locations.description: Ancient stone ruins overgrown with vines and moss, hidden deep in the forest.
locations.DM_notes: Contains traps and ancient treasures. Clues needed from town to find this location safely.

paths.description: Trail back to the forest edge.
paths.DM_notes: Difficult terrain and possible monster encounters.

locations.name: Mountain Cave Entrance 1
locations.description: A dark cave entrance at the forest's edge near the mountains, partially hidden by bushes.
locations.DM_notes: One of several entrances to an interconnected cave network. Contains dangerous creatures.

paths.description: Path back through the forest ruins area.

locations.name: Mountain Cave Entrance 2
locations.description: Another cave entrance near a rocky outcrop, leading into the mountain cave network.
locations.DM_notes: Less used entrance, guarded by monsters occasionally.

paths.description: A rough path through the forest near the bandit camp.
paths.DM_notes: Dangerous with chance of bandit encounter.
